stanza.line: When in disgrace with Fortune and men eyeseyes
I all alone beweep my outcast statestate
And trouble deaf heaven with my bootless criescries
And look upon my self and curse my fatefate
Wishing me like to one more rich in hopehope
Featured like him like him with friends possessedpossessed
Desiring this man art and that man scopescope
With what I most enjoy contented leastleast
Yet in these thoughts my self almost despisingdespising
Haply I think on thee and then my statestate
(Like to the lark at break of day arisingarising
From sullen earth) sings hymns at heaven gategate
For thy sweet love remembered such wealth bringsbrings
That then I scorn to change my state with kingskings
